intergalactic_adventure: Get ready for the intergalactic adventure
intro.longtime: A long time ago, in a galaxy far, far away...
intro.title: PoNG WARS
intro.subtitle: THE BATTLE OF THE PADDLES
intro.para1: in these troubled times, the fragile peace of the galactic system is threatened by dark Pong lords.
intro.para2: Armed with lightning-fast reflexes and legendary paddles, the Pong Masters battle in arenas forgotten by time.
intro.para3: Every point scored brings the winner closer to mastering the Force of Pong... and eternal glory.
intro.para4: You are one of these champions.
intro.para5: But the path to victory will be full of obstacles.
intro.para6: Formidable opponents await you, lurking in the shadows, ready to counter your every move.
intro.para7: The fate of the galaxy now rests in your skillful hands.
intro.para8: Will you overcome your limits and become the Supreme Pong Master?
intro.para10: May the ball be with you... and let the duel begin!
